days.name: Day 1 - Group Stages
days.description: Initial group stage matchups determining bracket positions for the tournament. Teams compete across E-District, Storm Point, and World's Edge.

matchups.title: Group A vs Group B
matchups.description: Opening group stage matchup featuring teams from Groups A and B. 6 games across E-District (2), Storm Point (2), and World's Edge (2).

matchups.title: Group C vs Group D
matchups.description: Second group stage matchup with teams from Groups C and D. Same map rotation as A vs B for fair competition.

matchups.title: Group B vs Group D
matchups.description: Cross-group matchup between Groups B and D. Rotated map order starting with Storm Point for strategic variety.

days.name: Day 2 - Cross Groups
days.description: Cross-group matchups determining final bracket seeding. Advanced map rotations test team adaptability.

matchups.title: Group A vs Group C
matchups.description: Day 2 cross-group matchup between Groups A and C. 6 games with E-District focus.

matchups.title: Group B vs Group C
matchups.description: Strategic cross-group battle between Groups B and C. Storm Point opening rotation.

matchups.title: Group A vs Group D
matchups.description: Final day 2 matchup between Groups A and D. Classic E-District to World's Edge progression.

days.name: Day 3 - Elimination Rounds
days.description: High-stakes elimination rounds where teams fight for tournament survival. Extended 8-game series with diverse map pools.

matchups.title: Elimination Round 1
matchups.description: First elimination round featuring 8 intense games. Heavy E-District focus with World's Edge finale.

days.name: Day 4 - Finals
days.description: Championship finals featuring the ultimate competition. Winners and elimination rounds determine the ALGS Champion.

matchups.title: Elimination Round 2
matchups.description: Second elimination round with 8 crucial games. Balanced map rotation for fair competition.
matchups.maps: Storm Point (2) → World's Edge (2) → E-District (2) → Mixed (2)

matchups.title: Winners Round 1
matchups.description: Winners bracket final featuring the top teams. 8 games across all three maps for ultimate victory.
matchups.maps: World's Edge (2) → E-District (2) → Storm Point (2) → Mixed (2)
